website_summaries.verdict: A quality set with enough pieces for multiple people to play with and enjoy.
pros: Set includes Catwoman, Batgirl, and Robin Lego figures
Motorcycle and jewelry store are also included in the set
139 piece set is easy to assemble
Sits at a valuable price point
cons: Motorcycle requires a lot of tiny parts, can be time consuming

customer_reviews.title: I know its all about the figs
customer_reviews.text: Ok so this may not be the most complex build out there, but it is fun and looks pretty cool once completed. Plus you get cat woman, bat woman, and robin from the Lego movie, which I could take or leave. Its all about getting that cat woman. At the time I bought this it was like 16 bucks and the box had some damage but everything inside was perfect. I dont know what the price is now. Still a fun set.
customer_reviews.author: Paddy H

customer_reviews.title: Good set. Love catwoman and the bike
customer_reviews.text: Good set. Love catwoman and the bike. The mini building is ok but the main reason to get this is for the bike and catwoman. Robin and Batgirl are cool also but there is a good chance you will get double of these if you buy a few of the other good sets.
customer_reviews.author: BaronTop Contributor: Batman

customer_reviews.title: Don't let Catwoman be the only one to get away with a "steal"!
customer_reviews.text: Really love this set. The storefront is minimalist in nature, but still encompassing enough to create a street scene - the added Newspaper machines were a fantastic added detail. Catwoman's motorcycle is just an oversized beast but has some pretty unique pieces that come in this neon purple color. Each minifig is fantastic and has a great level of detail, but I'm particularly taken by Batgirl's detail from her mask down to her boots. Great value for the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: CF

customer_reviews.title: Great little set
customer_reviews.text: I love this little set. It was an easy build (the motorcycle was the more difficult piece to assemble.) The quality is superb and the Catwoman figurine was the reason I bought this set. I wasn't too enthusiastic to get this Robin Lego movie version but Batgirl and Catwoman were worth the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Faith Hoffman

customer_reviews.title: Great non-Barbie toy for girls!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves it!!! She mainly plays with the motorcycle portion of the kit, but it's a great "girl toy" that's not a barbie. It came with two whips... which made me wonder if I received the adults-only version, haha!
customer_reviews.author: R

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Birthday Gift
customer_reviews.text: Nicely packaged and promptly shipped. Our 5 year old grandson LOVED this collection. Had no problems matching the photo for assembly. This was a good value for the contents but be advised, LOTS of tiny pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie K. Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Fun Set
customer_reviews.text: Cool set. I purchased this as a Valentine's gift for my son who is a big fan of the Lego Batman Movie. This set is nice because it comes with three mini figures, a vehicle and a store front. It was not a complicated build. Great for pretend play. I think it was a great value considering everything that is included.
customer_reviews.author: Cakebaby

customer_reviews.title: Great set. Very cute and clever
customer_reviews.text: Great set. Very cute and clever. Quite a few tiny parts though, so consider if its appropriate as it could be difficult to put together for anyone with manual dexterity issues.
customer_reviews.author: Alaina S.

customer_reviews.title: My son loved this set
customer_reviews.text: My son loved this set. He said it was easy to put together overall and really fun to play with. The only drawback was that the cat cycle was a bit hard to put together.
customer_reviews.author: applejax

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set primarily because it's a cheap way to get the Robin and Batgirl minifigures. The set is a very quick build, and the details are good, as always.
customer_reviews.author: Bee

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My 5 yr old enjoyed building it. And is still having fun playing with it.
customer_reviews.author: Adams12

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Kids have so much fun with these. My 7 year old loves to put these together.
customer_reviews.author: ted

customer_reviews.title: Awesome..
customer_reviews.text: Was a gift for my sister, who has the majority of Batman Lego Movie sets!! Came well packaged and was New as advertised!!
customer_reviews.author: M. Pomeroy

customer_reviews.title: Nice one for girls
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter was so excited that Lego made something for Catwoman. She thought it would be just Batman's time. The girls feel left out sometimes with the Lego sets.
customer_reviews.author: Dodger26

customer_reviews.title: Great Set!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product and was shipped quickly. It was the perfect gift! Would order again in the future!
customer_reviews.author: J R

customer_reviews.title: Legos are the best block system
customer_reviews.text: Legos are the best block system. 6 yr old daughter assembled it on her birthday. Product arrived in good shape and in a timely manner.
customer_reviews.author: Thadeus McTaggert

customer_reviews.title: iItem came as shown.
customer_reviews.text: Its legos my son love it. Item came as pictured
customer_reviews.author: Jessie

customer_reviews.title: Great kit, although some of the pieces are so ...
customer_reviews.text: Great kit, although some of the pieces are so small that I had to employ Rick Moranis to find him using his patented technology.
customer_reviews.author: davebkpr

customer_reviews.title: A lot smaller than I thought
customer_reviews.text: My niece loves the legos but I was a little disappointed at how small the box was. I felt like I should have bought her another one to go along with it, overall good though
customer_reviews.author: TunaLuna

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this and it came pretty quick was the best part
customer_reviews.author: marcy goldson

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: It is a Lego set. Really, do you need to say anything else? All of my kids love it. Lot of pieces for what I paid.
customer_reviews.author: A. Mack

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Just as described, son loved it. Box was crushed when arrived but the inside was fine and my son is obsessed with legos and Batman.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Loved it. Arrived as expected and my daughter had so much fun with this! Can't beat the price anywhere and so convienent!!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica CastilloTop Contributor: Calligraphy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My 6 year old enjoyed it. Another great Lego product!
customer_reviews.author: Cassie Mauck

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Set
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves Legos. I got it for her birthday and she is very happy with her gift.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My grown uncle helps my little girl cousin make these, really never to old for Legos!
customer_reviews.author: TaraAnn

customer_reviews.title: Grandson loves it
customer_reviews.text: Cheap packaging with no insulation and the box was smashed, but no pieces were broken, thank goodness.
customer_reviews.author: Alene Rutzky

customer_reviews.title: Little boy loved it
customer_reviews.text: might have just been delivery service but package was smashed no pieces broken though and my boy loved it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: 3 mini figs, a cool motorcycle, and a storefront (which plays very well with other sets / scenes). 5 yo girl LOVES it.
customer_reviews.author: JA

customer_reviews.title: Good Set
customer_reviews.text: The set seems small compared to other $20 sets, but it is $20 because of the piece count. Love the minifigures and the bike. Building is adequate. All in all a good set.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Tag

customer_reviews.title: Just enough pieces where it took him some time to put it together and enjoy, but not too many that he got frustrated ...
customer_reviews.text: My 6 year-old son loves this one. Just enough pieces where it took him some time to put it together and enjoy, but not too many that he got frustrated with it.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I'm only giving it 1 star because I received the wrong item
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Cool set
customer_reviews.text: My kids love this set. Timed well with the last Lego movie. Easy to assemble for my 6 yr old.
customer_reviews.author: Msandy

product_meta.title: LEGO Batman Movie Catwoman Catcycle Chase 70902
product_meta.description: Help Batgirl and Robin thwart a jewel heist in THE LEGO BATMAN MOVIE: Catwoman Catcycle Chase set, including the Catcycle and a buildable street scene with a jewelry store. Play-starting features include a lamppost with tipping function to knock over during the getaway pursuit, translucent diamond-style elements, plus Catwoman’s whip and Batgirl’s Batarangs. This great LEGO® Batman™ toy includes 3 minifigures.
feature_bullets: The Catwoman Catcycle features a minifigure seat, printed dashboard, big wheels with rubber tires, engine elements and a translucent headlight-style element
Includes three minifigures: Catwoman, Batgirl and Robin
The buildable street scene features a jewelry store with a window and opening door, both with translucent glass-style elements, shop sign on the roof plus two translucent diamond-style elements
Accessory elements include Batgirl and Robin’s capes, weapons include Catwoman’s whip and Batgirl’s two yellow Batarangs
Catwoman Catcycle measures over 1” (4cm) high, 5” (13cm) long and 1” (3cm) wide, Street scene excluding lamppost measures over 3” (8cm) high, 3” (9cm) wide and 1” (5cm) deep
This great LEGO® Batman™ toy offers an age-appropriate build and play experience for ages 7-14

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars254 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
